  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_96172</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_96172</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Production des oignons</string>
            <string language="en">Producing onions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Produzieren der Zwiebeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Produzindo cebolas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Produrre le cipolle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παραγωγή των κρεμμυδιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Producir cebollas</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre un bulbe d'oignon.  Des structures végétatives de cet oignon telles que la tige  peuvent être employées pour produire plus d'oignons.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an onion bulb. Vegetative structures of this onion such as the stem can be used to produce more onions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">bulbe d'oignon</string>
            <string language="en">onion bulb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">tige</string>
            <string language="en">stem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">structures végétatives</string>
            <string language="en">vegetative structures</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Zwiebel Birne. 
Vegetative Strukturen dieser Zwiebel wie der Stamm können 
benutzt werden, um mehr Zwiebeln zu produzieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um bulbo da cebola. 
As estruturas vegetative desta cebola tais como a haste podem 
ser usadas produzir mais cebolas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una lampadina della 
cipolla. Le strutture vegetative di questa cipolla quale il 
gambo possono essere usate per produrre più cipolle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει βολβό κρεμμυδιών. 
Οι φυτικές δομές αυτού του κρεμμυδιού όπως ο μίσχος 
μπορούν να χρησιμοποιηθούν για να παραγάγουν περισσότερα 
κρεμμύδια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un bulbo de la cebolla.
Las estructuras vegetativas de esta cebolla tales como el 
vástago se pueden utilizar para producir más cebollas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwiebel Birne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stamm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">vegetative Strukturen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bulbo da cebola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">haste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estruturas vegetative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lampadina della cipolla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gambo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strutture vegetative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βολβός κρεμμυδιών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μίσχος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυτικές δομές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">bulbo de la cebolla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vástago</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estructuras vegetativas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
